snippet.title: Watch Dogs Bad Blood Announce Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
snippet.description:
Watch_Dogs is back with a brand new DLC. Play as T-Bone and take on the Blume Corporation in this all new single player story. Season Pass holders get early access on September 23rd. Bad Blood will be available for purchase on September 30th for everyone!

Discover all our Watch_Dogs products and exclusive items on the Ubisoft Store: https://ubi.li/7tazq
